summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2466, for the improvement of east 26 feet of 5th Avenue South, from King Street to Seattle Boulevard; Weller Street, Dearborn Street, Seattle Boulevard, each from 5th Avenue South to 6th Avenue South; Lane Street, from 5th Avenue South to 6th Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same and by the construction of wooden walks, wooden curbs and gutters, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 26601 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
